title: that Act and the functions of the public authorities referred to in this Order,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (Section 29(1)) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (section 29(1)) order 2022

title: that Act and the functions of the public authorities referred to in this Order,
heading: 2. The following public authorities are prescribed as State authorities for
text_raw:
2. The following public authorities are prescribed as State authorities for 
the purposes of paragraph 20 of Schedule 3 to the National Treasury 
Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014): 

(a) Higher Education Authority; 

(b) Housing and Sustainable Communities Agency; 

(c) Sport Ireland; 

(d) A Technological University within 

the meaning of 

the 

Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 2018); 

(e) Waterways Ireland. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 August, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [439] 3
